summary: Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.
cast: Scott Adkins|Mykel Shannon Jenkins|Mark Ivanir|Hristo Shopov|Marko Zaror|Michael Baral|Ilram Choi|Robert Costanzo|Lateef Crowder|Esteban Cueto|Vernon Dobtcheff|Kiril Efremov|Valentin Ganev|Plamen Manassiev|Velislav Pavlov|Stefan Shterev|Nikolai Sotirov|Anton Trendafilov|Dimiter Doichinov|Borislav Iliev|Trayan Milenov-Troy|Radoslav Parvanov|Velizar Peev
title: Invicto 3: Redención
